DataElement.preferredName: Fagerstrom Test Difficulty Stop Public Smoking Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number that represents the condition of yes or no for the difficulty a person has in refraining from smoking in a public place as described by the Fagerstrom Test.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fagerstrom Test Difficulty Stop Public Smoking
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The difficulty a person has not smoking cigarettes in a public place as described by the Fagerstrom Test.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standard instrument for assessing the intensity of physical addiction to nicotine.

Concepts.definition: A standard instrument for assessing the intensity of physical addiction to nicotine.

Property.preferredDefinition: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.:Put an end to a state or an activity.:Not private; open to or concerning the people as a whole.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Concepts.definition: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
Not private; open to or concerning the people as a whole.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Modified to facilitate reuse by C3D adopters. mc 4/2/08

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The numbers that represent the conditions of yes and no as described by the Fagerstrom Test.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Fagerstrom Test for Nicotine Dependence Indicator Score
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A standard instrument for assessing the intensity of physical addiction to nicotine.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A standard instrument for assessing the intensity of physical addiction to nicotine.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Modified to facilitate reuse by C3D adopters. mc 4/2/08

ReferenceDocuments.name: Do you find it difficult to r
ReferenceDocuments.description: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden, e.g. in church, at the library, in the cinema?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NIDA Instrument Reference
ReferenceDocuments.description: Heatherton TF, Kozlowski LT, Frecker RC, Fagerstrom K. The Fagerstrom Test for Nicotine Dependence: a revision of the Fagerstrom Tolerance Questionnaire. British Journal of Addiction 1991;86:1119-1127.

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden?
